name: Sensor Dashboard
backend_requirements: Reading model: id, temperature, humidity, timestamp
GET /api/sensors/current - return latest reading (or generate random mock data)
GET /api/sensors/history?hours=24 - return readings from last N hours
POST /api/sensors/reading - accept new reading (for simulated sensor)
frontend_requirements: Large cards displaying current temperature and humidity
Simple line chart showing last 24 hours (Chart.js)
Color-coded alerts if values outside normal range
